alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 10:31PM CDT until May 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR CLEVELAND...SOUTHERN CLARK...SOUTHEASTERN GRANT...NORTHERN CALHOUN...DALLAS...OUACHITA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lamont to near Fordyce to near Chidester, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Camden... Fordyce... Rison... Gurdon... Bearden... Stephens... Kingsland... Sparkman... Thornton... Carthage... Chidester... Whelen Springs... Beirne... White Oak Lake State Park... Tipton... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... Ellisville... Lamont... Harlow... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 53 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita
